title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, instead of remaining intact, the second row is also removed. Additionally, when the delete occurs, the Launch item is moved to the first row, whereas it should stay on the second row.
EB: Press the Delete button. This should delete the first item on the second row, without removing the second row itself. The Launch item should remain on the second row and not be moved to the first row.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Run the attached test case. 2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem). 3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, putting it after the Open Type item. 4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Launch coolitem. 5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), putting it after the Search coolitem. 6. Press the Delete button. This should delete the first item on the second row, while leaving the second row intact.
